original_title: Chris: Live From Salle Pleyel Paris
overview: Christine and the Queens — A.K.A. French musician Héloïse Letissier — transformed into Chris for her second album. To mark its release, Apple Music goes behind the scenes in an exclusive short film about the creation of the project and the new alter-ego from which it takes its name.
title: Chris: Live From Salle Pleyel Paris
